Ingredients.2: 1 (2 pound) package frozen hash brown potatoes

Ingredients.3: 2 (16 ounce) packages frozen O'Brien hash brown potatoes

Ingredients.7: 8 (10.75 ounce) cans  cream of chicken soup, undiluted

Directions.1: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain on paper towels, reserving drippings in the skillet. Chop bacon into smaller pieces.

Directions.2: Combine hash brown potatoes, O'Brien hash brown potatoes, chicken bouillon, celery seed, and black pepper in a large pot over medium heat; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, until potatoes are tender, 20 to 30 minutes.

Directions.3: Puree potatoes with an immersion blender until smooth.

Directions.4: Pour reserved bacon drippings, cream of chicken soup, and milk into the pot. Simmer until heated through, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle chopped bacon on top.
